Class Cell

java.lang.Object
Cell
public class Cell extends Object
A cell that represents a position on the Silk Road that can contain a store or a robot, can be manipulated and draws itself on a canvas. The cell manages the positioning and visibility of its contained elements.
Version:
1.2
Author:
[Tu Nombre]
